description: After reviewing evidence of the Directorate’s abuses, Rada Miskovic secretly decides against a conventional exposé. Instead, she accesses Halden’s legacy protocols and prepares to trigger his AI inheritance system.
A close confidant voices support for unpredictable change, strengthening Rada’s resolve. She activates Halden’s inheritance protocol, setting off a hidden citywide sequence.

A citywide broadcast interrupts regular channels: Halden’s AI announces a competitive series of riddles—‘inheritance protocols’—with control of BCI subsystems as prizes. All factions, including citizens and the Council, are invited to participate.

The Council and citizen groups scramble to interpret the first riddle, which references Tower 9 and historic flaws in centralized BCI access. The contest ignites public debate over power and fairness in Stenograd.

A breakthrough in the riddle hunt disables all private Council overrides. For the first time, energy and transit control shift to neighborhood assemblies, weakening the Council’s grip. The city waits for Halden’s AI to reveal the next test.
